sentences.en: Dark glasses are an effective shield against the glare.
sentences.cn: 墨镜能有效地遮挡强光.

sentences.en: Dark glasses is an effective shield against the glare.
sentences.cn: 墨镜有效地阻隔强光保护眼睛.

sentences.en: From this time onward the greater part of the shield remained stable.
sentences.cn: 从此以后,地质的大部分保持稳定状态.

sentences.en: He clanged his sword three times on his shield.
sentences.cn: 他用他的剑当当当地敲了3下盾。

sentences.en: He held up his hands, shielding his eyes from the sun.
sentences.cn: 他抬手遮住眼睛免受阳光照射。

sentences.en: He shielded his head from the sun with an old sack.
sentences.cn: 他用一个旧袋子遮住头来防晒。

sentences.en: He used his left hand as a shield against the reflecting sunlight.
sentences.cn: 他用左手挡住反射过来的阳光。

sentences.en: I found out after , Hymie got me out from the shield.
sentences.cn: 后来我才知道是海米把我从高地区送出来的.

sentences.en: import tariffs that shield firms from foreign competition
sentences.cn: 保护企业免受外国竞争威的进口关税

sentences.en: It is our duty to shield our country from invasion.
sentences.cn: 保卫祖国不受侵犯是我们的责任.

sentences.en: Mezentius threw his spear, which struck Aenea's shield and glanced off.
sentences.cn: 墨曾提乌斯投了一枪, 打在阿涅阿斯的盾牌后往一边飞去.

sentences.en: She intended to shield the child from the bad information.
sentences.cn: 她打算不让这个孩子知道这个坏消息.

sentences.en: The gunman used the hostages as a human shield .
sentences.cn: 持枪歹徒用人质作人体盾牌。

sentences.en: The knight carried a shield with a cross painted thereupon.
sentences.cn: 骑士拿着绘着十字的盾牌.

sentences.en: The sword glanced off the knight's shield.
sentences.cn: 剑掠过武士的盾.

sentences.en: These trees will shield off arid winds and protect the fields.
sentences.cn: 这些树能挡住旱风,保护农田.

sentences.en: Thinking of lotus root makes me think in turn of water shield.
sentences.cn: 因为想起藕,又联想到莼莱.

sentences.en: This special metal shield will deflect a bullet from its course.
sentences.cn: 这种特殊的金属盾将使子弹改变方向.

sentences.en: We fear that the removal of our shield might tempt aggression.
sentences.cn: 我们担心撤掉保护伞会鼓励侵略.

sentences.en: Women will often lie to shield even the most abusive partner.
sentences.cn: 哪怕是再暴力的伴侣，女性也往往会撒谎保护他。

phrases.tran_cn: 电缆包皮；电缆的输入套管；电缆护套
莼菜；防水罩，挡泥板；密封条

trans.tran_cn: 盾，护罩，盾形奖牌，保护人
trans.tran_en: something that protects a person or thing from harm or damage
to protect someone or something from being harmed or damaged

trans.tran_cn: 保护，掩护，庇护，给…加防护罩
trans.tran_en: to protect someone or something from being harmed or damaged
